SnowCat::

She was hit by another missle.  As the dust cleared, she layed there. 
She groaned and slowly got up.  Her side had a hole blown through 
it.  You could see right through her.  She stood onher wobbly legs 
and looked at Striker as he flew off. "COWARD!" She then looked at 
the other bots.  She took a step forward and collapsed.  She was 
having trouble breathing and gasping for breath. Sparks flew out from 
the wires that were showing.  She coughed and moved her front paw a 
little. 

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Ramulus/Slayer::
> 
> Slayer growls in anger as more shots hit him, the Trainer stumbling 
> and nearly losing his balance. The war suit was doing its best to 
> protect him, but it couldn't take too much more. With a silent 
> command from him, his cloaking device activates, Slayer 
dissapearing 
> from view.
> 
> He jumps into the air, his jetpack lifting him up as he shoots 
> missile after missile at the bots on the ground.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Ramulus jumps to the side, a missile nearly hitting him. Another 
one 
> hits to the side of him, sending him flipping him into a tree.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> > SnowCat::
> > 
> > She saw the rocket come towards her.  She waited, then at the 
last 
> > second, jumped to the side to get out of the way.  The rocket 
> struck 
> > ground near her.  She fell and slowly got up.  She started off 
> again 
> > towards Striker and Ramulus. She fired her optic lazars at 
Striker. 
> > Ignoring her side, wires exposed and flapping around as she ran.
